akn:section.akn:heading: Second mortgage assistance for first-time homebuyers

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary shall make available a model program under which units of general local government provide loans (secured by second mortgages) with deferred payment of interest and principal to first-time homebuyers.
